eng: The national vaccination blitz campaign will kick off on Monday, 21 March, 2022, and [the] government is urging those that have not yet been vaccinated to take advantage of this exercise to do so," Ndlovu said.
xho: Iphulo leNational vaccination blitz liza kuqala ngoMvulo, umhla we21 kaMatshi, ngo-2022, kwaye urhulumente ubongoza abo bangekagonywa ukuba basebenzise eli thuba ukwenza oko,” utshilo uNdlovu.

eng: A number of Zimbabweans have refused vaccination, saying they do not trust the mainly donated Chinese-made Sinopharm and Sinovac vaccines.
xho: Uninzi lwabantu baseZimbabwe abalufuni ugonyo, besithi abaluthembi izitofu zogonyo ekunikelwe ngazo zohlobo lweSinopharm kunye neSinovac eyenziwe eChina.

eng: The country has lately recorded a rise in new infections – now cumulatively at 244,012 with 5,418 deaths, according to the Johns Hopkins University, which is tracking the global outbreak.
xho: Ilizwe kutsha nje lirekhode ukonyuka kohlobo olutsha lwesifo - ngoku lunyuke lwafika ku-244,012 kunye nabaswelekiyeyo abayi-5,418, ngokutsho kweYunivesithi yaseJohns Hopkins, elandelela esisifo sihlasele ihlabathi lonke.

eng: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributes that to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns.
xho: UGqr. Cleophas Chimbetete, umongameli weZimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, uthi loo nto ibangelwa kukushenxiswa kwamva nje kwemiqathango ethintelayo, enje ngokulwa kwezinto.

eng: He says, however, it is not time to panic, just to enforce WHO protocols, such masking and social distancing.
xho: Uthi, nangona kunjalo, ayiloxesha lokoyika, lixehsa lokunyanzelisa imigaqo ye-WHO, efana nokufihla ubuso kunye nokuncitshiswa kwentlalo.

eng: After relaxing measures, it is expected that cases will slightly go up.
xho: “Emva kokuba kuncitshiswe lemithetho, kulindeleke ukuba amanani abantu abanesisifu anyuke kancinci.

eng: But I also think that it is too early to make any meaningful conclusions, I think it is just an opportunity for us to strengthen our preventative measures and continue highlighting to the rest of the population that COVID is still with us.
xho: Kodwa ndicinga ukuba kusekutsha kakhulu ukuba senze naziphi na izigqibo ezinentsingiselo, ndicinga ukuba lithuba nje lethu lokuba someleze amanyathelo ethu okuthintela kwaye siqhubeke nokungxininisa kuluntu ukuba i-COVID iseyinto ekhoyo.

eng: The good news, though, is that severe cases have not gone up.
xho: Noko ke, iindaba ezimnandi zezokuba imeko zabagula ngamandla azikho phezulu.

eng: What we need to do is to continue to get vaccinated and what is important is that the government should – as it is doing – is monitor these numbers.
xho: Into ekunyazeleke ukuba siyenzile kukuqhubeka nokugonywa kwaye okubalulekileyo kukuba urhulumente enze – njengoko esenza – abeke iliso kula manani.

eng: There is no cause for alarm or cause for us to introduce new measures," Chimbetete said.
xho: Akukho sizathu soloyiko okanye isizathu sokuba senze amanyathelo amatsha, ”utshilo uChimbetete.

eng: Zimbabwe had a target of vaccinating at least 10 million people by the end of last year, a figure that some say was difficult to reach given the scarcity of resources and hesitance.
xho: Ilizwe laseZimbabwe belijolise ekugonyeni abantu abazizigidi ezilishumi ubuncinci ekupheleni konyaka ophelileyo, inani abathi bekunzima ukufikelela kulo ngenxa yokunqongophala kwezixhobo kunye nokuthandabuza koluntu.

eng: It has yet to announce when it plans to achieve herd immunity.
xho: Kusafuneka ibhengeze ukuba iceba ukufezekisa ukugonyeka kwabantu abaninzi.

eng: Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year
xho: IFinland ithweswe isithsaba sokuba lelona lizwe lonwabileyo kwiminyaka emihlanu elandelelanayo.

eng: Finland has been named the world's happiest country for the fifth year running, in an annual U.N.-sponsored index that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.
xho: IFinland ibizwe njengelona lizwe lonwabileyo kwihlabathi kunyaka wesihlanu uqhuba, kwisalathiso sonyaka esixhaswe yi-UN ephinde yabeka i-Afghanistan njengelona lizwe lingonwabanga, ilandelwa ngokusondeleyo yiLebhanon.

eng: Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing.
xho: ISerbia, iBulgaria kunye neRomania zirekhode ezona zinyuso zinkulu kwimpilontle.

eng: The largest falls in the World Happiness table, released on Friday, came in Lebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.
xho: Ukuwa okukhulu kwi World Hapiness Table, ekhutshwe ngoLwesihlanu, yeza eLebhanon, eVenezuela nase-Afghanistan.

eng: Lebanon, which is facing economic meltdown, fell to second from last on the index of 146 nations, just below Zimbabwe.
xho: ILebhanon, ejongene nokudodobala kwezoqoqosho, yawela kwindawo yesibini ukusuka ekugqibeleni kwisalathiso samazwe ali-146, ngezantsi nje kweZimbabwe.

eng: War-traumatized Afghanistan, already bottom of the table, has seen its humanitarian crisis deepen since the Taliban took power again last August.
xho: I-Afghanistan ehlaselwe yimfazwe, esele isezantsi etafileni, ibone ingxaki yobuntu isiba nzulu ukusukela oko iTaliban yathatha isihlalo sokuphatha kwakhona ngo-Agasti ophelileyo.

eng: U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.
xho: I-arhente yeZizwe eziManyeneyo iUNICEF iqikelela ukuba abantwana abasisigidi abangaphantsi kweminyaka emihlanu banokubulawa yindlala kobu busika ukuba abancediswa.

eng: This (index) presents a stark reminder of the material and immaterial damage that war does to its many victims," co-author Jan-Emmanuel De Neve said.
xho: Esi (isalathiso) sibonisa isikhumbuzo esicacileyo sezinto ezibonakalayo kunye nomonakalo ongabonakaliyo owenziwa yimfazwe kumaxhoba ayo amaninzi, utsho umbhali uJan-Emmanuel De Neve.

eng: The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.
xho: IWorld Hapiness Report, ngoku kunyaka wayo we-10, isekelwe kuvavanyo lwabantu lolonwabo lwabo, kunye neenkcukacha zezoqoqosho nezentlalo.

eng: It assigns a happiness score on a scale of zero to 10, based on an average of data over a three-year period.
xho: Inika amanqaku olonwabo kwisikali ukusuka kwiqanda ukuya kwi-10, ngokusekwe kumndilili wedatha kwisithuba seminyaka emithathu.

eng: This latest edition was completed before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
xho: Olu shicilelo lwamva lwenziwa phambi kokuba iRussia ihlasele iUkraine.

eng: Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch.
xho: Abantu baseMntla baseYurophu baphinde balawula iindawo eziphezulu - iDanes yikwindawo yesibini emva kweFinns, ilandelwa yi-Icelandic, iSwiss kunye neDutch.

eng: The United States rose three places to 16th, one ahead of Britain, while France climbed to 20th, its highest ranking yet.
xho: I-United States inyuke iindawo ezintathu ukuya kwi-16, enye ngaphambi kweBritain, ngelixa iFrance inyuke yaya kwindawo yama-20, indawo yayo ephezulu okwangoku.

eng: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.
xho: Kunye nokuba sempilweni entle, esekwe kuvoto lweGallup kwilizwe ngalinye, amanqaku olonwabo athathela ingqalelo iGDP, inkxaso yezentlalo, inkululeko yomntu kunye nenqanaba lorhwaphilizo.

eng: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic.
xho: Kulo nyaka ababhali basebenzise ulwazi oluvela kwimithombo yeendaba zentlalo ukuthelekisa iimvakalelo zabantu ngaphambi nasemva kwesifo sikazwelonke i-Covid-19.

eng: They found "strong increases in anxiety and sadness" in 18 countries but a fall in feelings of anger.
xho: Bafumene "ukwanda okunamandla kwixhala kunye nokungonwabii" kumazwe ali-18 kodwa ukwehla kweemvakalelo zomsindo.

eng: The lesson of the World Happiness Report over the years is that social support, generosity to one another and honesty in government are crucial for wellbeing," report co-author Jeffrey Sachs wrote.
xho: Imfundiso yengxelo yeWorld Hapiness Report  kwiminyaka edlulileyo kukuba inkxaso yentlalontle, isisa komnye nomnye kunye nokunyaniseka kukarhulumente kubalulekile kwintlalo-ntle, utshilo umbhali uJeffrey Sachs.

eng: World leaders should take heed."
xho: Iinkokheli zehlabathi kufuneka zithathele ingqalelo.

eng: The report raised some eyebrows when it first placed Finland at the top of its listings in 2018.
xho: Ingxelo yaba nokuthandabuzeka emva kokuba ibeke iFinland phezulu kuluhlu lwayo ngo-2018.

eng: Many of the Nordic country's 5.5 million people describe themselves as taciturn and prone to melancholy, and admit to eyeing public displays of joyfulness with suspicion.
xho: Uninzi lwabantu belizwe laseNordic lizizigidi ezi-5.5 zabantu bazichaza njengabantu abapholileyo kwaye bathanda ukuba nosizi, kwaye bavume ukuba bajonga imiboniso yoluntu yolonwabo ngeliso lokukrokra.

eng: But the country of vast forests and lakes is also known for its well-functioning public services, ubiquitous saunas, widespread trust in authority and low levels of crime and inequality.
xho: Kodwa ilizwe elinamahlathi namachibi amakhulu likwadume ngeenkonzo zalo zoluntu ezisebenza kakuhle, iisaunas ezifumaneka kuyo yonke indawo, ukuthembela ngokubanzi kwabasemagunyeni namanqanaba aphantsi olwaphulo-mthetho nokungalingani.

eng: Zimbabwe Court Orders Trial for NY Times Freelancer
xho: Inkundla yaseZimbabwe ikhupha umyalelo wetyala lomntu osebenzela iNY Times ngokuzimeleyo.

eng: A court in Zimbabwe dismissed a discharge application Tuesday in a case against a New York Times journalist.
xho: Inkundla yaseZimbabwe isichithile isicelo sokukhululwa ngoLwesibini kwityala elijongene nentatheli yeNew York Times.

eng: Freelance journalist Jeffrey Moyo is accused of flouting Zimbabwe's immigration laws when he allegedly helped two foreign reporters enter the southern African nation illegally last year.
xho: Intatheli ezimeleyo uJeffrey Moyo utyholwa ngokutyeshela imithetho yokungena kwabantu eZimbabwe xa kutyholwa ukuba wanceda iintatheli ezimbini zamazwe angaphandle ukuba zingene kweli lizwe laMazantsi eAfrika ngokungekho mthethweni kunyaka ophelileyo.

eng: Kathleen Mpofu — one of Moyo's lawyers — said the journalist will go on trial April 28.
xho: UKathleen Mpofu - elinye lamagqwetha kaMoyo - uthe intatheli izakuvela enkundleni ngomhla wama-28  kuEpreyli.

eng: The magistrate dismissed the application. He basically found that the state had led enough evidence for Mr. Moyo to be put to his defense and coming to this finding," Mpofu told VOA from Bulawayo, via WhatsApp.
xho: Umantyi usikhabile isicelo. Ufumanise ukuba urhulumente ukhokele ubungqina obaneleyo ukuba uMnu Moyo aziphendulele kwaye eze kwesi sigqibo, uMpofu uxelele iVOA esuka kwaBulawayo, kuWhatsApp.

eng: It seems the magistrate relied on the fact that the state had led the evidence of the allegedly false accreditation cards that had been obtained by the foreign journalist and based on his interpretation of the evidence led by the state, he found that it was sufficient to put the accused to his defense."
xho: “Kukhangeleka ngathi umantyi wayethembele kurhulumente ngobubungqina bamakhadi okutyholwa ngokuba bubuxoki afunyenwe yintatheli yelizwe langaphandle kwaye ngokwendlela atolika ngayo ubungqina obukhokelwa ngurhulumente, wafumanisa ukuba banele ukuba aziphendulele umtyholwa.

eng: Moyo's lawyers believed the case might be dismissed, after the same court earlier this month acquitted a Zimbabwe Media
xho: Amagqwetha kaMoyo akholelwa ukuba eli tyala lingachithwa, emva kokuba kwa le nkundla inye ekuqaleni kwale nyanga yalikhulula iphephandaba laseZimbabwe.

eng: Commission official, Thabang Manhika, for allegedly processing fake accreditations for two South Africa-based New York Times journalists who entered Zimbabwe and were later deported.
xho: Igosa lekomishini, u-Thabang Manhika, ngezityholo zokuqhuba iziqinisekiso zomgunyathi kwiintatheli ezimbini zase Mzantsi Afrika ze-New York Times ezingene eZimbabwe zaza zagxothwa kamva.

eng: Moyo and Manhika were being tried separately.
xho: UMoyo noManhika bebexoxa amatyala abo ngokwahlukeneyo.

eng: Zimbabwe's government says both Moyo and Manhika broke immigration laws.
xho: Urhulumente waseZimbabwe uthi uMoyo kunye noManhika bobabini bophule imithetho yokufudukela kwelinye ilizwe.

eng: Information Ministry Permanent Secretary Ndabaningi Nick Mangwana commented on Tuesday's ruling.
xho: Unobhala osisigxina kwiSebe lezoLwazi uNdabaningi Nick Mangwana uphawule ngesi sigwebo sangoLwesibini.

eng: We just want to see that there's law and order.
xho: Sifuna nje ukubona ukuba kukho umthetho nocwangco.

eng: If somebody has committed a crime or is percied, they will have their day in court, so he is having his day in court, so his outcome is not in our hands, it's in the hands of the criminal justice system.
xho: Ukuba umntu wophule umthetho okanye kuyacingelwa, uyakufumana usuku lwakhe enkundleni, ngoko ke ujongene nenkundla, ngoko ke isigqibo asikho sezandleni zethu, sisezandleni zenkqubo zobulungisa kulwaphulo mthetho.

eng: That's our position," Mangwana said.
xho: Yindawo yethu leyo,” utshilo uMangwana.

eng: Tabani Moyo of the Media Institute of Southern Africa, or MISA, has called for the journalist to be treated fairly.
xho: UTabani Moyo weMedia Institute of Southern Africa, okanye iMISA, umemelele ukuba le ntatheli iphathwe ngokufanelekileyo.

eng: MISA Zimbabwe underscores the need for fair trial. That is our position throughout till the end of the case.
xho: “I-MISA Zimbabwe igxininisa isidingo sokuxoxwa kwetyala ngobulungisa. Leyo yindawo esime kuyo lide liphele ityala.

eng: All we are saying is that he, just like any other citizen, deserves a fair trial," Moyo said.
xho: Kuyo yonke into esiyithethayo kukuba naye njengaye nawuphi na ummi, ufanelwe kukufumana ukuxoxa ityala lakhe ngobulungisa,” utshilo uMoyo.

eng: Moyo, a Zimbabwean national, faces up to 10 years in prison if convicted.
xho: UMoyo, ongummi waseZimbabwe, ujongene neminyaka elishumi entolongweni ukuba ufunyenwe enetyala.

eng: Zimbabwe Government Orders Vaccinated Workers Back to Work.
xho: Urhulumente waseZimbabwe uyalele abasebenzi abagonyiweyo ukuba babuyele emsebenzini.

eng: Zimbabwes government has ordered civil servants who are vaccinated against COVID-19 to immediately report for duty after more than a year of working from home, citing a declining in new cases of the virus in the country.
xho: Urhulumente waseZimbabwe uyalele abasebenzi bakarhulumente abathi bagonyelwe i-COVID-19 ukuba bakhawuleze baye emsebenzini emva konyaka besebenza ekhaya, echaza ukwehla kwamanani abantu abanalentsholongwane elizweni.

eng: Authorities also announced any government workers without proof of vaccination will be barred from workplaces and face punishments, including a freeze on their salaries.
xho: Abasemagunyeni baphinde babhengeza nabaphi na abasebenzi bakarhulumente abangenabo kobungqina bogonyo baya kuthintelwa kwiindawo zokusebenza kwaye bajongane nesohlwayo, kubandakanya nokumiswa kwemivuzo yabo.

eng: In a statement this week, President Emmerson Mnangagwas government said it wants its employees to resume meeting in person.
xho: Kwingxelo kule veki, urhulumente kaMongameli uEmmerson Mnangagwa uthe ufuna abasebenzi bakhe baphinde baqalise ukuhlangana ngokobuqu.

eng: Late Tuesday, Monica Mutsvangwa, the countrys information minister, said the number of people being hospitalized for COVID-19 is on a steady decline.
xho: Ngorhatya lwangoLwesibini, uMonica Mutsvangwa, umphathiswa wezolwazi welizwe, uthe inani labantu abalaliswe esibhedlele ngenxa ye-COVID-19 liyehla ngokuthe ngcembe.

eng: This indicates that the national response measures instituted by government continue to pay off.
xho: “Oku kubonisa ukuba amanyathelo okusabela kuzwelonke asungulwe ngurhulumente ayaqhubeka nokuba neziqhamo.

eng: In view of the continued decline in new cases and deaths, coupled with a declining testing positivity rate that is indicating that the community transmission has gone down, all ports of entry [are to] be reopened, but ensuring that all the recommended COVID-19 prevention measures are adhered to," she said.
xho: Ngobona ukwehla okuqhubekayo kumanani abantu abosuleleka sisifo sikazwelonke kunye nokufa, kudityaniswa nokwehla kwezinga labo baneziphumo ezimbi kuvavanyo okubonisa ukuba usulelo loluntu lwehlile, zonke iindawo zokungena kufuneka zivulwe kwakhona, kodwa kuqinisekiswe ukuba yonke imiqathango nemiyalelo  yokuzikhusela kwiCOVID-19 iyathotyelwa,” utshilo.

eng: However, the compulsory vaccination rule is not being welcomed by all civil servants.
xho: Nangona kunjalo, umthetho osisinyanzelo wogonyo awamkelwa ngabo bonke abasebenzi baseburhulumenteni.

eng: Obert Masaraure, the president of the Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, says the workers will take the matter to court if the government insists.
xho: Umongameli weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, uObert Masaraure, uthi abasebenzi bazakuwusa enkundleni lo mcimbi ukuba urhulumente uyanyanzelisa.

eng: A contract that was signed by civil servants has no provision for mandatory vaccination.
xho: “Ikhontrakthi eyasayinwa ngabasebenzi bakarhulumente ayinayo imiqathango yogonyo olunyanzeliswayo.

eng: So if the Public Service Commission wants to bar civil servants who are not vaccinated, they are in breach of contract and its unacceptable.
xho: Ngoko ke ukuba ikomishoni yekonzo zikarhulumente ifuna ukuvalela ngaphandle abasebenzi bakarhulumente abangagonywanga, bophula isivumelwano kwaye oko akwamkelekanga.

eng: Secondly, civil servants have a right to dignity, they have right to make choices.
xho: Okwesibini, abasebenzi bakarhulumente banelungelo lesidima, banelungelo lokuzikhethela.

eng: No one can be forced foreign substances to be inserted into their bodies," he noted.
xho: Akekho umntu unokunyanzelwa ukuba kufakwe izinto zangaphandle emizimbeni yakhe,” utshilo.

eng: Dr. Norman Matara, the head of Zimbabwe Association for Doctors for Human Rights, says his organization has noted that several other countries are moving towards compulsory vaccination.
xho: UGqirha Norman Matara, intloko yeZimbabwe Association for Doctors for Human Rights, uthi umbutho wakhe uqaphele ukuba amanye amazwe amaninzi ajonge kugonyo olusisinyanzelo.

eng: It is something that we are strongly against. We think mandating vaccines is something that fuels vaccine hesitance.
xho: Yinto esichasene nayo kakhulu. Sicinga ukuba ukugunyazisa amayeza okugonya yinto ephembelela ukuthandabuza kogonyo.

eng: There is a lot of conspiracy theory that goes around when people are saying we are being forced to be vaccinated.
xho: Ininzi into ethethekayo ejikelezayo xa abantu besithi sinyanzelwa ukuba sigonywe.

eng: We really have to get the buy in of people: spread the gospel of vaccines, how they work and then encourage people to get vaccinated and not force them to get vaccinated," he pointed out.
xho: Ngokwenene kufuneka sifumane imvume yabantu: sisasaze ulwazi ngogonyo, indlela asebenza ngayo emva koko sikhuthaze abantu ukuba bagonywe kwaye bangabanyanzeli ukuba bagonywe, ”utshilo.

eng: But Sifiso Ndlovu from the Zimbabwe Teachers Association supports the governments position.
xho: Kodwa uSifiso Ndlovu ophuma kwiZimbabwe Teachers Association uyaluxhasa uluvo lukarhulumente.

eng: Definitely, all workers should take up the vaccination.
xho: Ngokuqinisekileyo, bonke abasebenzi kufuneka bathathe ugonyo.

eng: Not because they want to protect themselves, but they want to protect their colleagues at work.
xho: Hayi ngokuba befuna ukuzikhusela, kodwa bafuna ukukhusela abantu abasebenza nabo emsebenzini.

eng: Scientific evidence has it that if you are fully vaccinated it comes with a mild attack.
xho: Ubungqina benzululwazi buthi ukuba ugonywe ngokupheleleyo luza nohlaselo olungephi.

eng: Why not take up that? There is nothing wrong or sinister about it," he said.
xho: Kutheni ungayithathi loo nto? Akukho nto iphosakeleyo okanye imbi ngayo,” utshilo.

eng: About 3.3 million people in Zimbabwe have received two shots of the COVID-19 vaccines, while about 86,000 have received a third jab.
xho: Bamalunga ne-3.3 yezigidi abantu eZimbabwe abaye bafumana izitofu ezimbini ze-COVID-19, ngelixa malunga ne-86,000 befumene isitofu sesithathu.

eng: A number of Zimbabweans have refused to get vaccinated, saying they do not trust the mainly donated Chinese-made Sinopharm and Sinovac vaccines.
xho: Uninzi lwabantu baseZimbabwe abavumi ukugonywa, besithi abawathembi amayeza ogonyo eSinopharm kunye neSinovac enziwa eChina..

eng: Private Military Contractors Bolster Russian Influence in Africa
xho: Iikontraka zomkhosi zabucala zixhasa impembelelo yeRussia eAfrika

eng: Russia's geopolitical ambitions in Africa have in recent years been backed by private military contractors, often described as belonging to the "Wagner group" — an entity with no known legal status.
xho: Amabhongo e-Russia malunga nezejiyografi kunye nezopolitiko e-Afrika kule minyaka yakutsha nje aye axhaswa ngoonokontraka babucala bazomkhosi, abasoloko bechazwa ngokuba ngamalungu "iWagner" - iqumrhu elingaziwayo ngokwasemthethweni.

eng: Most recently, Western nations have condemned the alleged arrival of Russian mercenaries in Mali's capital Bamako, a claim denied by the junta that seized power in 2020.
xho: Kutshanje, izizwe zaseNtshona zikugxekile ukufika kwamajoni aseRussia kwikomkhulu laseMali iBamako, ibango elaliweyo yiJunta eyathatha amandla okuphatha ngo-2020.

eng: As relations with France worsen, the military rulers may be looking for ways to make up for shrinking numbers of European troops fighting Mali's years-old jihadist insurgency.
xho: Njenokuba ubudlelwane neFrance busiya busiba mandundu, abalawuli basemkhosini banokuthi bakhangela iindlela zokulungiselela ukuncipha kwenani lemikhosi yaseYurophu ebikade isilwa ukuvukela kweJihadist yaseMali iminyaka.

eng: Mercs [mercenaries] working in Africa is an established norm" thanks in part to decades of operations by contractors from South Africa, said Jason Blazakis of the New York-based Soufan Group think tank.
xho: IiMercs [amajoni] asebenza e-Afrika yinto eqhelekileyo" ngenxa yamashumi eminyaka yokusebenza kweekontraka ezivela eMzantsi Afrika, utshilo uJason Blazakis weqela labacingi iSoufan eliseNew York.

eng: The Wagner folks are walking through a door that has long been open to their ilk," he added.
xho: Abantu bakwaWagner bangena kumnyango ekudala uvulelwe uhlobo lwabo,” wongeze watsho.

eng: No information is publicly available about the group's size or finances.
xho: Akukho lwazi lukhoyo lufumanekayo malunga nobungakanani beliqela okanye ubume bezimali yalo.

eng: But around Africa, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) in Washington has found evidence since 2016 of Russian soldiers of fortune in Sudan, South Sudan, Libya, the Central African Republic (CAR), Madagascar and Mozambique.
xho: Kodwa malunga ne-Afrika, iCenter for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) eWashington ifumene ubungqina ukususela ngo2016 amajoni aseRassia e-Fortune eSudan, eSouth Sudan, eLibya, kwiCentral African Republic (CAR), iMadagascar kunye neMozambique.

eng: Botswana, Burundi, Chad, the Comoros, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Congo-Brazzaville, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Nigeria and Zimbabwe are also on the CSIS's list.
xho: I-Botswana, iBurundi, iChad, iComoros, iDemocratic Republic of Congo, iCongo-Brazzaville, iGuinea, iGuinea-Bissau, iNigeria kunye neZimbabwe nazo zikuluhlu lweCSIS.

eng: In Africa "there is a convergence of many states' interests, including China's," Alexey Mukhin of the Moscow-based Centre for Political Information told AFP.
xho: E-Afrika "kukho ukuhlangana korhulumento lwamazwe amaninzi , oku kubandakanya iChina," u-Alexey Mukhin weCenter for Political Information eseMoscow utsho njalo  kwi-AFP.

eng: Every state has the right to defend its business assets," he added.
xho: Wonke urhulumente unelungelo lokukhusela inzuzo yeshishini lakhe,” wongeze watsho.

eng: Wagner does not officially exist, with no company registration, tax returns or organizational chart to be found.
xho: iWagner ayikho ngokusemthethweni, kwaye akukho kubhaliswa kwenkampani, iimbuyekezo zerhafu okanye inkcukaca zombutho ezifumanekayo.

eng: When the EU wanted to sanction the group in 2020, it targeted Russian oligarch Yevgeny Prigozhin, an ally of President Vladimir Putin who is suspected of running Wagner.
xho: Ngethuba i-EU yayifuna ukugweba eliqela ngo-2020, yayijolise kumphathi onamandla  waseRussia u-Yevgeny Prigozhin, umlingani kaMongameli u-Vladimir Putin okrokrelwa ngokukhokela iWagner.

eng: It imposed further sanctions in December last year when mercenaries' arrival in Mali appeared certain — drawing accusations of "hysteria" from Moscow.
xho: Yabeka ezinye izohlwayo ngoDisemba kulo nyaka uphelileyo xa ukufika kwamajoni eMali kubonakala ngokuqinisekileyo - kutyholwa "ukungabina ngqiqo" okuvela eMoscow.

eng: Western experts say military contractors are embedded in Russia's official forces like intelligence agencies and the army, providing plausible deniability for Moscow.
xho: Iingcali zaseNtshona zithi iikontraka zomkhosi zifakwe kwimikhosi esemthethweni yaseRussia njengee-arhente zobuntlola kunye nomkhosi, zinika inkxaso iMosco ngokuyikhanyelela.

eng: Their deployment to African countries aims to "enable Russia to... regain this sphere of influence" that fell away with the collapse of the Soviet Union, said CSIS researcher Catrina Doxsee.
xho: Ukuthunyelwa kwabo kumazwe aseAfrika kujolise "ekubeni iRussia ikwazi ukuba... iphinde ifumane elinqanaba lempembelelo" elatshabalala ukuwa kweSoviet Union, utshilo umphandi weCSIS uCatrina Doxsee.

eng: The mercenaries' presence has been growing even faster since a 2019 Russia-Africa summit.
xho: Ubukho bamajoni buya bukhula ngokukhawuleza ukusukela kwingqungquthela yeRussia-Afrika summit yango-2019.

eng: Moscow has been active "especially in what has traditionally been France's zone of influence" in former colonies like CAR and Mali, said Djallil Lounnas, a researcher at Morocco's Al Akhawayn university.
xho: IMoscow ibisebenza “ingakumbi kwindawo ebikade inempembelelo zaseFrance” kwiindawo ezazisakuba yimihlaba yabo ezifana neCAR neMali, utshilo uDjallil Lounnas, umphandi kwiyunivesithi yase-Al Akhawayn yaseMorocco.

eng: While military contractors sometimes shepherd Russian arms sales, the revenue "really pales compared with the profit they are able to generate from mining concessions and access to natural resources," Doxsee said.
xho: Ngelixa iikontraka zomkhosi ngamanye amaxesha zikhulisa ukuthengiswa kwezixhobo zaseRussia, ingeniso "incinci kakhulu xa ithelekiswa nengeniso abakwaziyo ukuyenza kwiimvumelwano zemigodi kunye nokufikelela kwimithombo yendalo," utshilo uDoxsee.

eng: That makes unstable countries with mineral or hydrocarbon wealth prime customers — such as in Syria where the mercenaries first became known to the wider public.
xho: Oko kwenza amazwe angazinzanga aneeminerali okanye ubutyebi be-hydrocarbon abathengi abaphambili - njengaseSyria apho la majoni aqala ukwaziwa kuluntu ngokubanzi.

eng: No questions asked
xho: Kungekho mibuzo ibuzwayo

eng: Lounnas said that another advantage for clients is a lack of friction over human rights and democracy that might come with Western partners.
xho: U-Lounnas uthe enye inzuzo kubathengi kukunqongophala kwengxabano kumalungelo oluntu kunye nedemokhrasi enokuthi ize namaqabane aseNtshona.

eng: Russia has its interests.
xho: IRussia inezinto enomdla kuzo.

eng: It doesn't ask questions," he added.
xho: Ayibuzi mibuzo, ”wongeze watsho.

eng: Reports of violence and abuse on the ground suggest that same latitude may extend to the mercenaries themselves.
xho: Iingxelo zobundlobongela kunye nokuphathwa gadalala aphoi zibonakalisa ukuba inkululeko efanayo inokufikelela kumajoni ngokwawo.

eng: In the CAR, the United Nations is probing an alleged massacre during a joint operation by government forces and Wagner fighters.
xho: Kwi-CAR, umbutho weZizwe Ezimanyeneyo uphonononga ukubulawa kwabantu abaninzi ngethuba kusebenzisana umkhosi karhulumente kunye namajoni weWagner.

eng: One military source told AFP that more than 50 people died, some in "summary executions."
xho: Oyimpimpi yasemkhosini uxelele i-AFP ukuba bangaphezulu kwe-50 abantu ababhubhileyo, abanye " bebulawa emva kokuthyolwa."

eng: On Thursday, the European Union said it would not resume military training in the CAR — suspended since mid-December — unless the country's soldiers stop working for Wagner.
xho: NgoLwesine, i-European Union ithe ayizukuphinda iqhubeke noqeqesho lwasemkhosini e-CAR - enqunyanyisiwe ukusukela phakathi kuDisemba - ngaphandle kokuba amajoni elizwe ayeke ukusebenzela iWagner.

eng: Meanwhile the mercenaries' results do not always measure up to the hopes of the governments that hire them.
xho: Ngeloxesha iziphumo zalamajoni azisoloko zifikelela kumathemba oorhulumente ababaqeshileyo.

eng: In Libya, Russian mercenaries suffered heavy losses in Marshal Khalifa Haftar's year-long attempt to conquer the capital Tripoli, which was ultimately unsuccessful.
xho: E-Libya, amajoni aseRussia afumana ilahleko enkulu kumzamo wonyaka ka-Marshal Khalifa Haftar wokoyisa ikomkhulu i-Tripoli, engazange iphumelele.

eng: And in Mozambique, the Russians retreated in the face of Islamic State group jihadists, ultimately losing out to South African competitors.
xho: Kwaye eMozambique, amaRussia arhoxa ebusweni beqela lama-Jihadists e-Islamic State, ekugqibeleni boyiswa ngabo bakhuphisana noMzantsi Afrika.

eng: Although lacking language skills and experience with the terrain, Wagner "were picked because they were the cheapest", Doxsee said.
xho: Nangona bengenazo izakhono zolwimi kunye namava kule ndawo, iWagner "yachongwa ngenxa yokuba yayiyeyona inexabiso eliphantsi", utshilo uDoxsee.

eng: They didn't have what it took to succeed," she added, noting that "they've had a fair few failures" across Africa.
xho: “Babengenako konke okudingekayo ukuze baphumelele,” wongeze watsho, ephawula ukuba “babenoko ukusilela okumbalwa” kwi-Afrika iphela.

eng: Succeeding completely might actually harm the mercenaries' business model, which thrives on unrest, conflict and crisis.
xho: Ukuphumelela ngokupheleleyo kusenokwenzakalisa ishishini labarhwebi, eliqhuba kakuhle kwisiphithiphithi, ungquzulwano kunye nobunzima.

eng: If a country such as the CAR hires them to train forces, to help them in their military efforts, its in their interest to accomplish that just well enough to continue to be employed," Doxsee said.
xho: “Ukuba ilizwe elinje ngeCAR libaqeshele ukuqeqesha imikhosi, ukubanceda kwiinzame zabo zomkhosi, kubalukelike ukuba kuyiphumeza oko ukuze baqhubeke nokuqeshwa,” utshilo uDoxsee.

eng: If they actually were to do it well enough to resolve the conflict, they would no longer be needed."
xho: Ukuba ngenene bebengayenza kakuhle ngokwaneleyo ukusombulula impixano, bekungazokubakho sidingo sabo.

eng: Cyclone Batsirai Weakens After Hitting Madagascar, Floods Feared
xho: INkanyamba uBatsirai Uba buthathaka emva kokubetha iMadagascar, Izantyalantyala zemvula ziyoyikwa

eng: Cyclone Batsirai weakened overnight but floods were still expected due to heavy rain after it hit eastern Madagascar with strong winds, the island's meteorological office said Sunday.
xho: Inkanyamba iBatsirai ibe buthathaka ngobusuku kodwa kusalindeleke ukudama kwamanzi ngenxa yezantyalantyala zemvula emva kokubetha impuma yeMadagascar ngomoya onamandla, iofisi yemozulu yesiqithi yatsho njalo ngeCawe.

eng: Batsirai has weakened," Meteo Madagascar said, adding that the cyclone's average wind speed had almost halved to 80 kph, while the strongest gusts had scaled back to 110 kph from the 235 kph recorded when it made landfall on Saturday evening.
xho: “I-Batsirai ibuthathaka,” utshilo uMeteo Madagascar, esongeza ukuba isantya somoya esiphakathi kwalenkanyamba siphantse sehla ukuya kuma-80 kph, ngethuba ezona mvula zivuthuza ngamandla ziye zehla zaya kutsho kwi-110 kph ukusuka kuma-235 aqwalaselweyo xa ifike ngokuhlwa kwangoMgqibelo.

eng: The cyclone, the second storm to hit the large Indian Ocean island nation in just a few weeks, was moving westwards at a rate of 19 kph, the meteorological services said.
xho: Inkanyamba, isaqhwithi sesibini esihlasele ilizwe elikhulu lesiqithi selwandle iIndian Ocean kwiiveki nje ezimbalwa, sasisiya ngasentshona ngesantya se-19 kph, zatsho iinkonzo zemozulu.

eng: But "localized or generalized floods are still feared following the heavy rains," it said, adding that Batsirai should emerge at sea in the Mozambique Channel later Sunday.
xho: Kodwa "izantyalantyala zemvula okanye iimpuphuma zasekuhlaleni zisoyikwa emva kweemvula ezinkulu," yatsho, isongeza ukuba iBatsirai kulindeleke ukuba ivele elwandle kwijelo laseMozambique kamva ngeCawe.

eng: Batsirai made landfall in Mananjary district, more than 530 kilometers southeast of the capital Antananarivo, around 8 p.m. local time (1700 GMT) Saturday.
xho: I-Batsirai yenze ukunkuphuka komhlabal kwisithili saseMananjary, ngaphezulu kweekhilomitha ezingama-530 kumazantsi mpuma we-Antananarivo, malunga ngezithuba zo-8 ngorhatya lexesha lendawo (1700 GMT) ngoMgqibelo.

eng: It reached the island as an "intense tropical cyclone", packing winds of 165 kph, Faly Aritiana Fabien of the country's disaster management agency told AFP.
xho: Ifike kwisiqithi "njengenkanyamba enkulu", ephethe imimoya engama-165 kph, uFaly Aritiana Fabien we-arhente yokulawula iintlekele yelizwe uxelele i-AFP.

eng: The national meteorological office has said it fears "significant and widespread damage."
xho: I-ofisi yemozulu yelizwe ithe yoyika "umonakalo omkhulu kwaye owndileyo."

eng: Just an hour and a half after it first hit land, nearly 27,000 people had been counted as displaced from their homes, Fabien said.
xho: Kwiyure nje enesiqingatha emva kokuba ifikile emhlabeni, phantse abantu abangama-27,000 babalwe njengangasenawo makhaya, utshilo uFabien.

eng: He said his office has accommodation sites, food and medical care ready for victims, as well as search and rescue plans already in place.
xho: Uthe iofisi yakhe ineendawo zokuhlala, ukutya kunye nokhathalelo lwezonyango olulungele amaxhoba, kunye nezicwangciso zokukhangela nokuhlangula ezisele zikhona.

eng: Very serious threat'
xho: Ingozi enkulu kakhulu'

eng: The Meteo-France weather service had earlier predicted Batsirai would present "a very serious threat" to Madagascar, after passing Mauritius and drenching the French island of La Reunion with torrential rain for two days.
xho: Inkonzo yemozulu yaseMeteo-France yaxela kwangaphambili ukuba iBatsirai uza kuba "yingozi enkulu" eMadagascar, emva kokudlula eMauritius kwaye yamanzisa isiqithi saseFrance iLa Reunion ngemvula enkulu iintsuku ezimbini.

eng: In the hours before the cyclone hit, residents hunkered down in the impoverished country, still recovering from the deadly tropical storm Ana late last month.
xho: Kwiiyure ezingaphambi kokuba inkanyamba ifike, abahlali baqubuda bazifika kwelizwe lizihluphekelayo, besachacha kubhubhani wenkanyama iAna ekhupheleni kwenyanga.

eng: In the eastern coastal town of Vatomandry, more than 200 people were crammed in one room in a Chinese-owned concrete building.
xho: Kwidolophu esempuma yonxweme yaseVatomandry, abantu abangaphezu kwama-200 babexinaniselene kwigumbi elinye kwisakhiwo sekonkile samaTshayina.

eng: Families slept on mats or mattresses.
xho: Iintsapho zazilala kwiimethi okanye koomandlalo.

eng: Community leader Thierry Louison Leaby lamented the lack of clean water after the water utility company turned off supplies ahead of the cyclone.
xho: Inkokeli yabahlali uThierry Louison Leaby ukhale ngokungabikho kwamanzi acocekileyo emva kokuba inkampani esebenza ngamanzi yacima izixhobo ngaphambi kwenkanyamba.

eng: People are cooking with dirty water," he said, amid fears of a diarrhea outbreak.
xho: “Abantu bapheka ngamanzi amdaka,” utshilo, phakathi koloyiko lokuqhambuka korhudo.

eng: Outside plastic dishes and buckets were placed in a line to catch rainwater dripping from the corrugated roofing sheets.
xho: Ngaphandle izitya zeplastiki kunye nee-emele zazibekwe emgceni ukuze kubanjwe amanzi emvula athontsiza kumacangci ophahla.

eng: The government must absolutely help us. We have not been given anything," he said.

eng: The restrictions, imposed last month, were meant to blunt the spread of the COVID omicron variant.

eng: White House spokesman Kevin Munoz said on Twitter that the decision was recommended by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
xho: Isithethi se-White House uKevin Munoz uthe kuTwitter ukuba isigqibo sicetyiswe yiCenters for Disease Control and Prevention.

eng: Munoz said the temporary travel bans bought scientists necessary time to study the new virus variant and conclude that the current vaccinations are effective in blunting its impact.
xho: UMunoz uthe izithintelo zokwethutyana malunga nohambo zinike izazinzulu ixesha ebezilidinga lokufunda uhlobo olutsha lwentsholongwane kwaye zigqibe kwelokuba ugonyo olukhoyo luyasebenza ekulweni impembelelo zesisifo.

eng: Omicron is now spreading rapidly throughout the U.S., including among the vaccinated, but a huge majority of those being hospitalized are unvaccinated.
xho: I-Omicron ngoku isasazeka ngokukhawuleza kulo lonke elase-US, kubandakanywa nabagonyiweyo, kodwa uninzi lwabo balaliswe esibhedlele abagonywanga.

eng: The restrictions gave us time to understand Omicron and we know our existing vaccines work against Omicron," Munoz wrote on Twitter.
